ParameterList.name: ETF Standard Parameters for XML test objects

TestAssertion.label: Check CRS
TestAssertion.expression: let $featuresWithErrors := $features[//@srsName[.!='http://www.opengis.net/def/crs/EPSG/0/28992' and .!='EPSG:28992' and .!='urn:ogc:def:crs:EPSG::28992']][position() le $limitErrors] return (if ($featuresWithErrors) then 'FAILED' else 'PASSED', local:error-statistics('TR.featuresWithErrors', count($featuresWithErrors)), for $feature in $featuresWithErrors order by $feature/@gml:id return local:addMessage('TR.example.crsNot28992', map { 'filename': local:filename($feature), 'featureType': local-name($feature), 'gmlid': string($feature/@gml:id), 'crs': data(($feature//@srsName[.!='http://www.opengis.net/def/crs/EPSG/0/28992' and .!='EPSG:28992' and .!='urn:ogc:def:crs:EPSG::28992'])[1]) }))

TestAssertion.label: Valid GML geometry (2D) all at once
TestAssertion.description: Test geometry on being valid GML geometry for 2D, all tests at once

TestAssertion.label: Valid GML geometry (2D) General Validation
TestAssertion.description: Test geometry on being valid GML geometry for 2D - General Validation

TestAssertion.label: Valid GML geometry (2D) Polygon Patch Connectivity
TestAssertion.description: Test geometry on being valid GML geometry for 2D - Polygon Patch Connectivity

TestAssertion.label: Valid GML geometry (2D) Repetition of Position in CurveSegments
TestAssertion.description: Test geometry on being valid GML geometry for 2D - Repetition of Position in CurveSegments
